S1.name: Spirit:
S1.text: I look forward to our next meeting King Solun!

S2.name: Spirit:
S2.text: The subsidy you provided my business is a great gift, thank you, my king.

S3.name: Spirit:
S3.text: Great king! I hope you will visit our home again soon, we loved feeding you.

M1.name: Spirit:
M1.text: Times are changing... Help us, great king.

M2.name: Spirit:
M2.text: Hear us, please… Don’t shut yourself out.

M3.name: Spirit:
M3.text: Great king, please don’t take my little boy away… It’s all we have.

neutral.name: Spirit:
neutral.text: Do you think this statue actually looks like him?
